name: Stickman Pixel Archer
summary:
Massive enemy armies are coming with ultimate weapons. You are the last surviving archer on a mission to defeat all who stand in your way. Pick your ancestors' most precious and powerful bow to take them down. Archery with fire, ice, or poison, it's your choice. Bring a painful and quick death to the enemy.

The game is simple: Drag and drop to shoot arrows. Try to shoot straight in the head for instant victory. Four power-ups can help you in the battle: Heal, Shield, Arrow Shower, and Teleport.

Be careful, your enemies are training every day, and make sure your gear is upgraded.
